A sketch of the northern parts of New Jersey

Object Name
Map
Title
A sketch of the northern parts of New Jersey
Date
[1781]
Author
Hills, John (Surveyor); Morgan, Benjamin (Draftsman)
Contributor or associated name
Millidge, Thomas
Holding institution
Library of Congress, Geography and Map Division
Description from holding institution
col. map; 97 x 83 cm. Scale 1 to 126,720; 2 miles to an in; Manuscript, pen-and-ink and watercolor; Has watermarks. Relief shown by hachures. Original attributed to B. Morgan and T. Milliadge through table of contents of the collection. LC Maps of North America, 1750-1789, 1251
Source
hdl.loc.gov
